message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper proposes a new topic model and inference algorithm that addresses concerns with current topic models, such as unnatural switching of topics within documents and high computational demands. The proposed model is based on identifying characteristic keywords for topics, which influence topic-assignments of nearby words. This approach is relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
